name: Ghosts need cigarettes
description:
You're a ghosts in a need of a pack of cigarettes, look through the haunted house and interact with different spirits or objects in order to reach your goal ! 

"Ghosts need cigarettes" is a mini Bitsy game I made in one day. The quality might be a bit bad because  I accidentally deleted the finished product and this is the only version I had saved :/ 

1-3 minutes play time

Made in https://bitsy.org
